title: Additional Benefits for IR Prime Members

benefits.title: Get an Edge with IR Prime
benefits.content: Knowledge may be power but what your business needs is actionable insights from domain experts. IR Prime Membership unlocks a treasure trove of business intelligence that help readers get a competitive edge.

benefits.title: Exclusive curated content
benefits.content: In-depth articles written and by a team of journalists with over 25 years of experience writing about the retail business and retail leaders

benefits.title: 50,000+ Articles
benefits.content: From store openings, visual merchandising and marketing to finance and funding, technology and strategy IR Prime will unlock access to over 30,000 articles and other content about every aspect of retail

benefits.title: Focussed Newsletters
benefits.content: From fashion & lifestyle, beauty and wellness to technology, IR Prime will get you focussed retail content on 6 categories and functions of retail delivered to your inbox, every day.
